Footer.headline: Seeking my first opportunity. <emphasis>Shall we talk?</emphasis>
Footer.description: I'm a front-end developer passionate about creating modern and functional interfaces. I enjoy turning ideas into real experiences using technologies like <nextjs>Next.js</nextjs>, <typescript>TypeScript</typescript>, and <tailwind>Tailwind CSS</tailwind>.

Metadata.title: Gustavo Henrique | Front-end Developer - Next.js & React
Metadata.description: Front-end Developer focused on building high-performance, accessible, and robust web applications. Expertise in Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

openGraph.title: Gustavo Henrique | Front-end Developer - Next.js & React
openGraph.description: Building fast and accessible digital experiences. Check out my projects built with Next.js and TypeScript.

Hero.introduction: Transforming ideas into digital experiences <linkTag>View my projects</linkTag>
Hero.headline: Frontend developer focused on design, performance, and accessibility.
Hero.description: I create modern and responsive interfaces, with attention to detail and user experience. I work with technologies like <nextjs>Next.js</nextjs>, <tailwind>Tailwind</tailwind>, and <react>React</react>.

Services.headline: Modern, performant, and experience-focused front-end solutions.
Services.description: I build optimized, accessible, and consistent interfaces — from design to implementation — using modern technologies like <nextjs>Next.js</nextjs>, <typescript>TypeScript</typescript>, and <tailwind>Tailwind</tailwind>. My focus is on combining performance and aesthetics to deliver solid and intuitive applications.

0.title: Modern Front-End Development
0.description: I create fast and responsive interfaces with Next.js and TypeScript, ensuring a solid and scalable foundation for any web project.

1.title: Reusable and Consistent Components
1.description: I develop modular interfaces with ShadCN and Tailwind CSS, maintaining clear visual standards and a smooth experience across the entire site.

2.title: Focus on Experience and Detail
2.description: I integrate good UX practices, micro-interactions, and subtle animations to create engaging and intuitive experiences.

3.title: Performance and Best Practices
3.description: I optimize SEO, loading time, and accessibility, applying advanced rendering techniques and image optimization in Next.js.

About.introduction: Who I am and My Journey
About.headline: The Developer Behind the Code.
About.paragraphIntroduction: I am a Front-end Developer with a passion for translating design into web applications that are <emphasis>performant, accessible, and aesthetically pleasing</emphasis>. My work is driven by the constant pursuit of efficiency and clean code.
About.details: I began my journey in <emphasis1>January 2022</emphasis1> with a degree in Systems Analysis and Development (completed July/2024), complemented by continuous practice and specialized courses. My core <emphasis2>stack</emphasis2> is <emphasis3>Next.js, TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS</emphasis3>, allowing for the creation of robust and scalable interfaces, often with multi-language support via <emphasis4>next-intl</emphasis4>.
About.skills: I have the ability to <emphasis1>learn quickly</emphasis1> and adapt to new challenges. I work collaboratively, mastering good <emphasis2>clean code</emphasis2> practices and agile methodologies such as <emphasis3>Scrum and Kanban</emphasis3>, ready to actively contribute in dynamic, high-performance environments.

tailwind-store.title: Tailwind Store — Fullstack E-commerce
tailwind-store.description: Complete platform with Next.js and Sanity CMS, featuring checkout flow, Google authentication, and multi-language support.

rachel-stone.title: Rachel Stone — Personal Trainer
rachel-stone.description: High-fidelity landing page based on professional design, focused on performance, SEO, and full internationalization support.

skillbridge.title: SkillBridge — E-learning Platform
skillbridge.description: Modern educational interface focused on accessibility (WCAG), course structuring, and internationalized navigation.

square-up.title: SquareUp — Digital Agency
square-up.description: Modern corporate website with dark theme, focused on service presentation, web engineering processes, and high visual fidelity.
